nodes.text: Iope was the third moon of the planet Rinn, in the Baxel sector. It was here that the assassin X-7 hired a team of mercenary pilots to hunt down and kill Luke Skywalker.

During the Galactic War, archaeologists discovered an eerie and dense growth of berries in the Knurled Highlands of Iope. They were considered the only remaining evidence that there had been a settlement in the region eons ago.
